item.title: LT Foods Establishes New Rice Manufacturing Facility in Raichur with â‚¹60 Million Investment
item.description:
<![CDATA[LT Foods has announced the establishment of a new manufacturing facility in Raichur, marking a significant expansion in its rice production capabilities. The facility is specifically designed to focus on regional rice varieties, addressing the growing demand for diverse rice products in the market.
Facility Specifications and Investment
The new Raichur facility represents a substantial investment in the company's manufacturing infrastructure. Key details of the project include:
